heading: HB00883
0: AN ACT REQUIRING OWNERS OF BUSINESS ESTABLISHMENTS SUCH AS BUT NOT LIMITED TO SHOPPING MALLS, MARKETS, SCHOOLS, HOSPITALS TO PROVIDE FOR FREE ADEQUATE PARKING AREAS FOR THEIR CLIENTELE AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF
